function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High false match rate in schema matching due to similarity measure","Impact":"Inaccurate schema matching may lead to incorrect conclusions and data integration errors.","Mitigation":"Improve similarity measures and perform manual verification of potential matches.","Technologies":"Advanced similarity measures, manual verification tools.","People":"Data scientists, semantic web experts.","Owner":"Data science team, semantic web team."},{"Description":"Inconsistent naming convention may lead to confusion and misinterpretation","Impact":"Difficulty in locating and understanding data triples, leading to interoperability issues and misinterpretation of data.","Mitigation":"Enforce strict adherence to RDF naming convention and provide training on naming conventions.","Technologies":"Naming convention validation tools, training materials.","People":"Data engineers, semantic web developers.","Owner":"Data management team, semantic web team."},{"Description":"Low-quality literal information in KGs may affect entity alignment performance","Impact":"Inaccurate entity alignment may lead to faulty integration of knowledge graphs and incorrect data analysis.","Mitigation":"Improve data quality in knowledge graphs, review and clean up literal information.","Technologies":"Data quality improvement tools, data cleaning algorithms.","People":"Data scientists, knowledge graph curators.","Owner":"Data science team, knowledge graph team."}]}
